Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that PM Modi announced free laptops for two crore youth under the 'Make in India' initiative. There is no official government validation of this announcement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no official government website validating the announcement of free laptops for youth.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the message circulating on social media is a government initiative, but it is actually a scam website created to gather users' personal data.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that it is a misinformation campaign aimed at deceiving people and collecting their personal information.
